actor_awards.notes: A professional athlete turned actor, he played both MLB baseball (Chicago Cubs) and NBA basketball (Boston Celtics) before finding fame. Best known for his iconic role as Lucas McCain in 'The Rifleman'. Won a Golden Globe for Best TV Star - Male in 1960.

filmography.title: The Rifleman
filmography.role_description: A widower and Civil War veteran who wields a customized Winchester rifle to protect his ranch and son in the New Mexico Territory. (TV Series)
filmography.plot: A Union veteran and widower raises his son on a ranch in the Wild West, using his lightning-fast rifle to maintain order.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best TV Star - Male

filmography.title: The Big Country
filmography.role_description: The cowardly and brutish son of a ruthless rancher, who serves as a foil to the gentlemanly protagonist.
filmography.plot: A New England sea captain arrives in the Old West to marry his fiancée and becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over water rights.

filmography.title: Old Yeller
filmography.role_description: The original owner of the beloved dog who allows the Coates family to keep him in exchange for a home-cooked meal.
filmography.plot: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive.

filmography.title: Soylent Green
filmography.role_description: The bodyguard of a murdered executive who becomes a person of interest in the investigation.
filmography.plot: In a dystopian future where Earth is overpopulated and resources are scarce, a detective uncovers a terrifying secret about the food supply.
filmography.awards: Saturn Award: Win – Best Science Fiction Film

filmography.title: Roots
filmography.role_description: A slave owner who rapes Kizzy and sells her son, Chicken George. (TV Miniseries)
filmography.plot: A multi-generational saga of an African family sold into slavery in the United States.
filmography.awards: Emmy: Nomination – Outstanding Lead Actor for a Single Appearance in a Drama or Comedy Series

filmography.title: Pat and Mike
filmography.role_description: A police captain in this Tracy-Hepburn comedy. Connors' film debut.
filmography.plot: A spectacular female athlete engages a shady sports promoter as her manager, leading to romance and professional success.

filmography.title: Move Over, Darling
filmography.role_description: The athletic new husband of a woman whose first husband returns after being lost at sea.
filmography.plot: A woman who was presumed dead for five years returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

filmography.title: Geronimo
filmography.role_description: The legendary Apache leader fighting for the freedom of his people.
filmography.plot: The Apache chief Geronimo leads his people in a fight against the U.S. government and the encroaching settlers.

filmography.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
filmography.role_description: A tough, cigar-chomping sergeant on the lunar shuttle.
filmography.plot: A computer malfunction causes a shuttle heading to the Moon to go off course and head straight for the Sun.

filmography.title: Flipper
filmography.role_description: A fisherman father who initially opposes his son keeping a dolphin but eventually comes to appreciate the animal.
filmography.plot: A fisherman's son befriends a dolphin that helps him in his daily life and adventures.

filmography.title: Tourist Trap
filmography.role_description: The seemingly kindly but psychopathic owner of a roadside museum filled with mannequins.
filmography.plot: A group of teenagers are stranded at a secluded roadside museum where the owner has a telekinetic power to control mannequins.

filmography.title: Designing Woman
filmography.role_description: A tough-guy theatrical producer and friend to Gregory Peck's character.
filmography.plot: A sportswriter and a fashion designer marry after a whirlwind romance, but their different lifestyles and friends cause friction.

filmography.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: A cameo as a notorious gunfighter who is impersonated by the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A gigolo con man arrives in a mining town and is mistaken for a famous gunfighter, a case of mistaken identity he exploits.

filmography.title: Captain Nemo and the Underwater City
filmography.role_description: An American senator who is rescued by Captain Nemo and taken to his domed city under the sea.
filmography.plot: Survivors of a shipwreck are rescued by Captain Nemo and taken to his fantastic underwater city, where they are told they can never leave.

filmography.title: Trouble Along the Way
filmography.role_description: The ex-husband of the main character, adding conflict to the custody battle.
filmography.plot: A disgraced football coach gets a second chance at a small Catholic college but faces a custody battle for his daughter.

filmography.title: South Sea Woman
filmography.role_description: A Marine sergeant involved in a court-martial concerning adventures in the Pacific.
filmography.plot: A Marine is court-martialed for desertion and theft, but his testimony reveals a series of heroic and comedic misadventures in the South Pacific.

filmography.title: The Human Jungle
filmography.role_description: A menacing hoodlum who becomes the primary antagonist for a police captain.
filmography.plot: A police captain takes over a precinct in a high-crime area and tries to clean up the streets despite internal and external opposition.

filmography.title: Ride Beyond Vengeance
filmography.role_description: A buffalo hunter who returns home with a fortune only to be branded a thief and seeks revenge.
filmography.plot: A buffalo hunter returns to his hometown to reconcile with his wife, but is attacked, branded, and robbed by local citizens.

filmography.title: Naked Alibi
filmography.role_description: A police captain determined to catch a cop-killer, leading him to Mexico.
filmography.plot: A police chief pursues a suspect in a cop killing to a Mexican border town, where he gets involved with a saloon singer.

filmography.title: Tomahawk Trail
filmography.role_description: A tough cavalry sergeant who takes command of a patrol when his inexperienced lieutenant proves incompetent.
filmography.plot: A sergeant must take command of a cavalry patrol under Apache attack when their commanding officer suffers a breakdown.

filmography.title: Good Morning, Miss Dove
filmography.role_description: A police officer and former student of the strict but beloved town teacher.
filmography.plot: A strict and proper schoolteacher reflects on her life and the students she has influenced when she is hospitalized.

filmography.title: Target Zero
filmography.role_description: A soldier in a lost patrol trying to rejoin their unit during the Korean War.
filmography.plot: An American infantry patrol in Korea is cut off behind enemy lines and must fight their way back to safety.

filmography.title: Three Stripes in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A soldier stationed in occupied Japan who overcomes his prejudices.
filmography.plot: An American soldier who hates the Japanese is stationed in Japan and slowly learns to respect the culture and people.

filmography.title: Hot Rod Girl
filmography.role_description: A police detective trying to curb illegal street racing.
filmography.plot: A police detective tries to stop illegal drag racing in a small town after the death of a young racer.

filmography.title: Kill Them All and Come Back Alone
filmography.role_description: A mercenary leader hired to steal gold from a Confederate fortress.
filmography.plot: A mercenary is hired by the Confederate army to steal a shipment of gold from a Union fortress, but double-crosses abound.

filmography.title: 99 and 44/100% Dead
filmography.role_description: A professional hitman hired by a mob boss to handle a gang war.
filmography.plot: A mob boss hires a professional hitman to eliminate his rival in a gang war.

filmography.title: The Birdmen
filmography.role_description: A prisoner of war who helps plan an escape using a glider. (TV Movie)
filmography.plot: Based on a true story, Allied POWs in a German castle build a glider to escape.
